Item.Name: C_AGR
Item.Label: Prom

Item.Name: DESDE
Item.Label: Ano

Item.Name: HASTA
Item.Label: Ano

Item.Name: N_IDE
Item.Label: Prom
Item.Hint: Ingrese El Número De Identificación Del Proveedor.

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
If :Control.N_Ide Is Null Then
 :Control.NomProv := Null;
Else
 :Control.NomProv := Trae_Nombre (:Global.Empresa, :Control.N_Ide);
End If;

Item.Name: C_TIP
Item.Label: Prom
Item.Hint: Ingrese El Número De Identificación Del Proveedor.

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
If :Control.c_tip Is Null Then
 :Control.NomTipo := Null;
Else
 begin
 select nom 
 into :Control.NomTipo
 from tipcont_Cxp
 where c_emp=:global.empresa
 and c_tip = :cont_cxp.c_tip;
 exception
 when no_Data_found then
 :Control.NomTipo := null;
 end;
End If;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
Declare
 pl_id ParamList; 
BEGIN 
 pl_id := Get_Parameter_List ('tmpdata'); 
 IF NOT Id_Null(pl_id) THEN 
 Destroy_Parameter_List( pl_id ); 
 END IF; 
 pl_id := Create_Parameter_List('tmpdata'); 
 Add_Parameter (pl_id, 'C_EMP', TEXT_PARAMETER, :GLOBAL.EMPRESA); 
 Add_Parameter (pl_id, 'c_agr', TEXT_PARAMETER, :cont_cxp.c_agr); 
 Add_Parameter (pl_id, 'n_cont', TEXT_PARAMETER, :cont_cxp.n_cont); 
 Add_Parameter (pl_id, 'n_ide', TEXT_PARAMETER, :cont_cxp.n_ide);
 Call_Form ('Cxp3004', Hide, DO_Replace, NO_Query_Only, PL_ID);
END;

Block.Name: CONT_CXP
Block.WhereClause:
c_emp = :global.empresa 
and n_ide like nvl(:control.n_ide,'%') 
and F_CREA_CONT between :control.desde and :control.hasta 
and c_tip like nvl(:control.c_tip,'%')

Trigger.Name: ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 recstat VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status; 
 startitm VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item; 
 rel_id Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN 
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 --
 -- Begin CONT_OTROSI detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:CONT_CXP.C_EMP is not null) or (:CONT_CXP.N_CONT_REF is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('CONT_CXP.CONT_CXP_CONT_OTROSI'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'CONT_OTROSI'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End CONT_OTROSI detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin INT_CONT_CXP detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:CONT_CXP.C_EMP is not null) or (:CONT_CXP.N_CONT is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('CONT_CXP.CONT_CXP_INT_CONT_CXP'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'INT_CONT_CXP'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End INT_CONT_CXP detail program section
 --

 IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN 
 Go_Item(startitm); 
 Check_Package_Failure; 
 END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: PRE-DELETE
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 --
 -- Begin CONT_OTROSI detail program section
 --
 DELETE FROM CONT_CXP C
 WHERE C.c_emp = :CONT_CXP.C_EMP and C.N_CONT = :CONT_CXP.N_CONT_REF;
 --
 -- End CONT_OTROSI detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin INT_CONT_CXP detail program section
 --
 DELETE FROM INT_CONT_CXP I
 WHERE I.c_emp = :CONT_CXP.C_EMP and I.n_cont = :CONT_CXP.N_CONT;
 --
 -- End INT_CONT_CXP detail program section
 --
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 SELECT NOM, COD_CONTROL, CLASE_F201A 
 INTO :CONT_CXP.NOMBRE_TIPO, :CONT_CXP.COD_CONTROL, :CONT_CXP.CLASE_F201A 
 FROM TIPCONT_CXP 
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND C_TIP = :CONT_CXP.C_TIP; 
EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :CONT_CXP.NOMBRE_TIPO := NULL;
 :CONT_CXP.COD_CONTROL := NULL;
 :CONT_CXP.CLASE_F201A :=NULL;
END;
:CONT_CXP.NOM_PROV := TRAE_NOMBRE(:GLOBAL.EMPRESA,:CONT_CXP.N_IDE);
:CONT_CXP.NOMINTER := TRAE_NOMBRE(:GLOBAL.EMPRESA,:CONT_CXP.INTERVENT);
SYNCHRONIZE; 
BEGIN
 SELECT NOM 
 INTO :CONT_CXP.NOMBRE_CCOS
 FROM CCOST 
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND C_COS = :CONT_CXP.C_COS; 
EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :CONT_CXP.NOMBRE_CCOS := NULL; 
END;
BEGIN
 SELECT TIPO 
 INTO :CONT_CXP.TIPO_CXP
 FROM CXP_ENC E 
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND c_agr = :CONT_CXP.c_Agr
 AND N_IDE = :CONT_CXP.N_IDE
 AND N_CXP = :CONT_CXP.N_CXP; 
EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :CONT_CXP.TIPO_CXP := NULL; 
END;
IF :CONT_CXP.TIPO_CXP IS NOT NULL THEN
 BEGIN
 SELECT nom
 INTO :CONT_CXP.nom_TIPO_CXP
 FROM tipo_cxp E 
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND c_tip = :CONT_CXP.TIPO_CXP; 
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :CONT_CXP.nom_TIPO_CXP := NULL; 
END;
END IF;

Item.Name: INTERVENT
Item.Label: Intervent
Item.Hint: Por Favor Digite El Numero de Identificación Del Interventor

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
If :Int_Cont_Cxp.Intervent Is Null Then
 :Int_Cont_Cxp.NomInter := Null;
Else
 Begin
 Select Nom Into :INT_Cont_Cxp.NomInter
 From Nits 
 Where C_Emp = :Global.Empresa and
 N_Ide = :INT_Cont_Cxp.Intervent and
 Est = 'A';
 Exception
 When No_Data_Found Then
 :INT_Cont_Cxp.NomInter:='Interventor No Se Encuentra Registrado';
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End;
End If;

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
Begin
 Select Nom Into :INT_Cont_Cxp.NomInter
 From Nits 
 Where C_Emp = :Global.Empresa and
 N_Ide = :INT_Cont_Cxp.Intervent;
 Exception
 When No_Data_Found Then
 :INT_Cont_Cxp.NomInter:='Interventor No Se Encuentra Registrado';
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-MOUSE-CLICK
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 COMANDO VARCHAR2(200);
 -- Declare the OLE objects
 ROOT_LECTOR VARCHAR2(100);
 ROOT_EXCEL VARCHAR2(100);
 NOMBRE_ARCHIVO VARCHAR2(100);
 application ole2.obj_type;
 workbooks ole2.obj_type;
 workbook ole2.obj_type;
 worksheets ole2.obj_type;
 worksheet ole2.obj_type;
 cell ole2.obj_type;
-- Declare handles to OLE argument lists
 args ole2.list_type;
 REGISTRO INTEGER;
 CAMPO INTEGER;
 CAMPOS ITEMS_IN_BLOCK;
 Form_Name VARCHAR2(50);
 Form_ID FORMMODULE;
 Block_Name VARCHAR2(50);
 Block_ID BLOCK;
 Item_Name VARCHAR2(50);
 Item_ID ITEM;
 Item_Typ VARCHAR2(50);
 TEXTO VARCHAR2(6000);
 PERMISO NUMBER(2):=0;
 CONSEC_FILE NUMBER;
BEGIN
 
 BEGIN
 SELECT NVL(OPP$SES,0) INTO PERMISO
 FROM OPP$USU
 WHERE OPP$NOM = :GLOBAL.USUARIO_SP6; 
 exception
 when others then
 messagebox('Error '||sqlcode||' '||sqlerrm); 
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END;
 TOOL_ENV.GETVAR ('EXCEL_PATH',ROOT_EXCEL);
 if root_excel is null then 
 TOOL_ENV.GETVAR ('INICIO_SP6',ROOT_LECTOR);
 HOST (ROOT_LECTOR||'\LEER_REGEDIT.EXE');
 TOOL_ENV.GETVAR ('EXCEL_PATH',ROOT_EXCEL);
 end if;
 IF PERMISO = 1 THEN -- Start Excel and make it visible
 application:= ole2.create_obj('Excel.Application');
 --ole2.set_property(application, 'VISIBLE', 'TRUE'); 
 -- Return object handle to the Workbooks collection
 workbooks:= ole2.Get_Obj_Property(application, 'Workbooks'); 
 -- Add a new Workbook object to the Workbooks collection
 workbook:= ole2.Get_Obj_Property(workbooks,'Add'); 
 -- Return object handle to the Worksheets collection for the Workbook
 worksheets:= ole2.Get_Obj_Property(workbook, 'Worksheets'); 
 -- Add a new Worksheet to the Worksheets collection
 worksheet:= ole2.Get_Obj_Property(worksheets,'Add'); 
 -- Return object handle to cell A1 on the new Worksheet
 CAMPO:=1;
 Block_ID := FIND_BLOCK(:TOOLBAR.NOMBRE_BLOQUE);
 GO_BLOCK (:TOOLBAR.NOMBRE_BLOQUE);
 FIRST_RECORD;
 REGISTRO:=1;
 LOOP
 CAMPO:=1;
 Item_Name := GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(Block_ID,FIRST_ITEM);
 Item_ID := FIND_ITEM(:toolbar.nombre_bloque||'.'||Item_Name);
 WHILE Item_ID.ID != 0 LOOP
 Item_Typ := GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(Item_ID,ITEM_TYPE);
 IF Item_Typ = 'BUTTON' THEN
 TEXTO:=NULL;
 ELSIF Item_Typ = 'CHART ITEM' THEN
 TEXTO:=NULL;
 ELSIF Item_Typ = 'CHECKBOX' THEN
 IF REGISTRO=1 THEN
 TEXTO:=ITEM_NAME;
 ELSE
 TEXTO:=NAME_IN(:toolbar.nombre_bloque||'.'||ITEM_NAME);
 END IF;
 ELSIF Item_Typ = 'DISPLAY ITEM' THEN 
 IF REGISTRO=1 THEN
 TEXTO:=ITEM_NAME;
 ELSE 
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(Item_ID,DATATYPE) = 'CHAR' THEN
 TEXTO:=''''||NAME_IN(:toolbar.nombre_bloque||'.'||ITEM_NAME);
 ELSE
 TEXTO:=NAME_IN(:toolbar.nombre_bloque||'.'||ITEM_NAME);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 ELSIF Item_Typ = 'IMAGE' THEN
 TEXTO:=NULL;
 ELSIF Item_Typ = 'LIST' THEN
 IF REGISTRO=1 THEN
 TEXTO:=ITEM_NAME;
 ELSE
 TEXTO:=NAME_IN(:toolbar.nombre_bloque||'.'||ITEM_NAME);
 END IF;
 ELSIF Item_Typ = 'OLE OBJECT' THEN
 TEXTO:=NULL;
 ELSIF Item_Typ = 'OLE CONTAINER' THEN
 TEXTO:=NULL;
 ELSIF Item_Typ = 'RADIO GROUP' THEN
 IF REGISTRO=1 THEN
 TEXTO:=ITEM_NAME;
 ELSE
 TEXTO:=NAME_IN(:toolbar.nombre_bloque||'.'||ITEM_NAME);
 END IF;
 ELSIF Item_Typ = 'TEXT ITEM' THEN
 IF REGISTRO=1 THEN
 TEXTO:=ITEM_NAME;
 ELSE
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(Item_ID,DATATYPE) = 'CHAR' THEN
 TEXTO:=''''||NAME_IN(:toolbar.nombre_bloque||'.'||ITEM_NAME);
 ELSE
 TEXTO:=NAME_IN(:toolbar.nombre_bloque||'.'||ITEM_NAME);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 ELSIF Item_Typ = 'USER AREA' THEN
 TEXTO:=NULL;
 ELSIF Item_Typ = 'VBX CONTROL' THEN
 TEXTO:=NULL;
 END IF;
 args:= ole2.create_arglist; 
 ole2.add_arg(args, REGISTRO); /* row number */
 ole2.add_arg(args, CAMPO); /* column number */
 cell:= ole2.Get_Obj_Property(worksheet, 'Cells', args);
 ole2.destroy_arglist(args); /* Set the contents of the cell to 'Hello Excel! */
 ole2.set_property(cell, 'Value', TEXTO); /* Save the workbook and quit Excel */
 CAMPO:=CAMPO+1;
 Item_Name := GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(:toolbar.nombre_bloque||'.'||Item_Name,NEXTITEM);
 Item_ID := FIND_ITEM(:toolbar.nombre_bloque||'.'||Item_Name);
 END LOOP;
 IF (:SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD='TRUE' AND REGISTRO > 1) OR REGISTRO = 65500 THEN
 EXIT;
 ELSE 
 IF REGISTRO = 1 THEN
 REGISTRO:=REGISTRO+1;
 ELSE
 NEXT_RECORD;
 REGISTRO:=REGISTRO+1;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;
 FIRST_RECORD;
 args:=ole2.create_arglist;
 CONSEC_FILE:=TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MI'))*TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'SS'));
 NOMBRE_ARCHIVO:=:TOOLBAR.NOMBRE_BLOQUE||CONSEC_FILE||'.XLS';
 ole2.add_arg(args, ROOT_LECTOR||'\'||NOMBRE_ARCHIVO);
 ole2.invoke(workbook, 'SaveAs', args);
 ole2.destroy_arglist(args);
 ole2.invoke(application,'Quit');
 ole2.release_obj(cell);
 ole2.release_obj(worksheet);
 ole2.release_obj(worksheets);
 ole2.release_obj(workbook);
 ole2.release_obj(workbooks);
 ole2.release_obj(application);
 Host(ROOT_EXCEL||'EXCEL.EXE '||ROOT_LECTOR||'\'||NOMBRE_ARCHIVO);
 ELSE
 MESSAGEBOX('SU CUENTA DE USUARIO NO TIENE PERMISO PARA EXPORTAR DATOS A EXCEL');
 END IF; 
END;

Graphics.Name: GRAPHIC74
Graphics.GraphicsText: Forma de Pago o Forma de Recolección

TextSegment.Name: CADTEXTO45
TextSegment.Text: Forma de Pago o Forma de Recolección

ProgramUnit.Name: BUSCAR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE buscar IS
BEGIN
 go_block('cont_cxp');
 clear_block(no_validate);
 Execute_Query (All_records);
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: INICIO
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE INICIO IS
BEGIN
 Execute_Trigger ('INIT');
 /*Set_Item_Property ('ToolBar.Boton_Imprimir', Enabled, Property_False);
 Set_Item_Property ('ToolBar.Boton_Save', Enabled, Property_False);
 Set_Item_Property ('ToolBar.Boton_Nuevo', Enabled, Property_False);
 Set_Item_Property ('ToolBar.Boton_Borrar', Enabled, Property_False);*/
 If (:parameter.c_emp is not null and 
 :Parameter.c_agr is not null ) then
 :global.empresa := :parameter.c_emp;
 :control.c_agr := :parameter.c_agr;
 :control.n_ide := :parameter.n_ide;
 buscar ;
 End if;
 
 
 go_block('control');
 
 Begin 
 Select C_AGE, NOM
 Into :CONTROL.C_AGR, :CONTROL.NOM 
 From AGENCIA 
 Where C_Emp = :Global.Empresa ;
 Exception 
 When No_Data_Found Then 
 MESSAGEBOX('No se ha definido parametros de Proveedores');
 exit_form(no_validate); 
 When TOO_MANY_ROWS Then 
 NULL; 
 End; 
 
 
 
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_PACKAGE_FAILURE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
Procedure Check_Package_Failure IS
BEGIN
 IF NOT ( Form_Success ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: QUERY_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Query_Master_Details(rel_id Relation,detail VARCHAR2) IS
 oldmsg VARCHAR2(2); -- Old Message Level Setting
 reldef VARCHAR2(5); -- Relation Deferred Setting
BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Variable(s)
 --
 reldef := Get_Relation_Property(rel_id, DEFERRED_COORDINATION);
 oldmsg := :System.Message_Level;
 --
 -- If NOT Deferred, Goto detail and execute the query.
 --
 IF reldef = 'FALSE' THEN
 Go_Block(detail);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 :System.Message_Level := '10';
 Execute_Query;
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Relation is deferred, mark the detail block as un-coordinated
 --
 Set_Block_Property(detail, COORDINATION_STATUS, NON_COORDINATED);
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 RAISE;
END Query_Master_Details;

ProgramUnit.Name: CLEAR_ALL_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Clear_All_Master_Details IS
 mastblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Initial Master Block Causing Coord
 coordop VARCHAR2(30); -- Operation Causing the Coord
 trigblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Cur Block On-Clear-Details Fires On
 startitm VARCHAR2(61); -- Item in which cursor started
 frmstat VARCHAR2(15); -- Form Status
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 curdtl VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Detail Block

 FUNCTION First_Changed_Block_Below(Master VARCHAR2)
 RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 retblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Return Block
 BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Vars
 --
 curblk := Master;
 currel := Get_Block_Property(curblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 --
 -- While there exists another relation for this block
 --
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 --
 -- Get the name of the detail block
 --
 curblk := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 --
 -- If this block has changes, return its name
 --
 IF ( Get_Block_Property(curblk, STATUS) = 'CHANGED' ) THEN
 RETURN curblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- No changes, recursively look for changed blocks below
 --
 retblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(curblk);
 --
 -- If some block below is changed, return its name
 --
 IF retblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 RETURN retblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Consider the next relation
 --
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- No changed blocks were found
 --
 RETURN NULL;
 END First_Changed_Block_Below;

BEGIN
 --
 -- Init Local Vars
 --
 mastblk := :System.Master_Block;
 coordop := :System.Coordination_Operation;
 trigblk := :System.Trigger_Block;
 startitm := :System.Cursor_Item;
 frmstat := :System.Form_Status;

 --
 -- If the coordination operation is anything but CLEAR_RECORD or
 -- SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS, then continue checking.
 --
 IF coordop NOT IN ('CLEAR_RECORD', 'SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS') THEN
 --
 -- If we're processing the driving master block...
 --
 IF mastblk = trigblk THEN
 --
 -- If something in the form is changed, find the
 -- first changed block below the master
 --
 IF frmstat = 'CHANGED' THEN
 curblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(mastblk);
 --
 -- If we find a changed block below, go there
 -- and Ask to commit the changes.
 --
 IF curblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 Go_Block(curblk);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(ASK_COMMIT);
 --
 -- If user cancels commit dialog, raise error
 --
 IF NOT ( :System.Form_Status = 'QUERY'
 OR :System.Block_Status = 'NEW' ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;

 --
 -- Clear all the detail blocks for this master without
 -- any further asking to commit.
 --
 currel := Get_Block_Property(trigblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 curdtl := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 IF Get_Block_Property(curdtl, STATUS) <> 'NEW' THEN
 Go_Block(curdtl);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(NO_VALIDATE);
 IF :System.Block_Status <> 'NEW' THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- Put cursor back where it started
 --
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 END IF;
 RAISE;

END Clear_All_Master_Details;

RecordGroup.Name: PROVEEDOR
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select distinct n_ide, trae_nombre(c_emp,n_ide) nom 
from cont_cxp 
where c_emp = :global.empresa 
order by 2

RecordGroup.Name: AGENCIA
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select c_age, nom 
from agencia 
where c_emp = :global.empresa
order by 1

RecordGroup.Name: TIPO_CONTRATO
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select c_tip, nom 
 from tipcont_Cxp
 where c_emp=:global.empresa
order by 1

RecordGroup.Name: CCOSTOS
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT C_COS, NOM
FROM CCOST 
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
AND CLA_CC = 'D'
AND ACTIVO ='S'
ORDER BY 1

Trigger.Name: INIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
Declare
 Empresa Parametros.Emp%Type;
 LogoPath Varchar2 (200); 
Begin
 --
 -- Maximiza la ventana inicial
 --
 :SYSTEM.MESSAGE_LEVEL:=20;
 Set_Window_Property ('WINDOW0', Window_State, Maximize);
 
 --
 -- Selecciona el nombre de la empresa
 --
 --:GLOBAL.empresa := '01';
--:GLOBAL.usuario_SP6 := 'ADMIN'; 
 :TOOLBAR.c_emp := :GLOBAL.empresa;
 Begin
 Select Emp, logo Into Empresa, :toolbar.nombre_logo
 From Parametros
 Where C_Emp = :TOOLBAR.c_emp;
 Exception
 When no_data_found Then
 --
 -- Si la empresa no está definida se sale de la forma
 --
 MessageBox ('Empresa '||:TOOLBAR.c_emp||' no está definida.');
 Exit_Form (No_Validate); 
 End;
 --
 -- Despliega el nombre de la empresa en una o dos líneas
 -- dependiendo de la longitud del nombre
 --
 :Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa1 := Empresa;
 :Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa2 := Empresa;
 If (NVL(Length (:Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa1), 0) > 30) Then
 Set_Item_Property ('Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa2', Displayed, Property_True);
 Set_Item_Property ('Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa1', Displayed, Property_False);
 Else
 Set_Item_Property ('Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa2', Displayed, property_False);
 Set_Item_Property ('Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa1', Displayed, property_True);
 End If;
 --
 -- Despliega el logo de la empresa
 --
 execute_trigger('lee_imagenes');

 --
 -- Llama al procedimiento de inicio particular de cada forma
 --
 Default_Value ('***', 'global.audsid'); 
 Begin
 Select machine Into Empresa
 From v$usr_sess
 Where audsid = :Global.audsid;
 Exception
 When others Then
 -- Exit_Form (No_Validate); 
 NULL; 
 End;
End;

Trigger.Name: ON-CLEAR-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 Clear_All_Master_Details;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--
